MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TypedValue As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ TypedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 根据架构类型，以最适合的 Microsoft .NET Framework 类型的已装箱对象的形式获取当前经验证的 XML 元素或特性。

span.span: Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.

value.span: 作为最适合的 .NET Framework 类型的已装箱对象的当前经验证的 XML 元素或特性。

span.span: The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的值根据其指定的架构类型无效，则属性的值与属性的值 等效 。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 有关命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息 ，请参阅 [System.Xml 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ValueAs (Type type, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type type, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ValueAs (type As Type, nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ type, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);

param.name: type
param.span: 将经验证的 XML 元素或特性值返回时使用的类型。

span.span: The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 用于解析命名空间前缀的 对象。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: 将经验证的 XML 元素或特性值按指定类型返回，并使用指定的 对象解析命名空间前缀。

span.span: Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: 请求类型的经验证的 XML 元素或特性值。

span.span: The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法尝试将经验证的 XML 元素或属性的值转换为指定的 Microsoft .NET Framework 类型。The method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified. 对象用于解析与类型转换相关的命名空间前缀。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，将转换为时 `xs:QName` `xs:string` 。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 有关命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息 ，请参阅 [System.Xml 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

exception.span: 验证的 XML 元素或特性的值不是适用于目标类型的正确格式。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

exception.span: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

span.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValueAsBoolean As Boolean
public: virtual property bool ValueAsBoolean { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取经验证的 XML 元素或特性的 形式的值。

span.span: Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a .

value.span: 经验证的 XML 元素或特性的 形式的值。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性 根据用于转换项类型的 XPath 2.0 规则尝试将验证的 XML 元素或属性的值转换为 Microsoft .NET 框架类型。The property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 有关命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息 ，请参阅 [System.Xml 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

exception.span: 验证的 XML 元素或特性的值不是适用于 类型的正确格式。

span.span: The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the type.

exception.span: 尝试到 的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast to is not valid.
Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

summary.span: 获取经验证的 XML 元素或特性的 Microsoft .NET Framework 类型。

span.span: Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.

value.span: 经验证的 XML 元素或特性的 .NET Framework 类型。

span.span: The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取经验证的 XML 元素或特性的类型化值的 .NET Framework 类型。The property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute. 例如，类型为 `xs:int` 的元素默认具有的 。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但是， 可以是可以映射到的有效类型之一 `xs:int` ，例如 或 。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 有关命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息 ，请参阅 [System.Xml 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).
